text: The first media to raise few questions that experimental riders would ask. Now I understand the real benefits of a wider handlebar, but why is it so limited to just swinging left and right? The winglet part seems like a joke üòÇ. I tested it once and the winglet gone inside the side panel. It couldn't bear the weight of 207kg üòè. _They need serious RnD  to protect the bike during a crash, go for aerospace material i.e light n super strong._  *They should also focus on weight reduction and quick service improvements.*
